title: brass type - any proof for bodoni?
content:
Hi,  
can you name this one? And maybe add, which foundry casted it and when?  
some hints: it probably runs under the name fette bodoni (or something close) and might be created first by schelter & giesecke. if you can confirm this and maybe add the year - that would be perfect!  
thanks,  
oliver
author: lazydog

comments.content: It might be Antiqua Modern Fett on page 2 (per Alfred Bastien and G. J. Freshwater), but other details are, sadly, lacking...

Oliver, did you mention S&G because you know that's where it's from, or are you guessing?

- Mike Yanega

If not S&G, could be Bauer...

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/n1ke/3342527350/in/pool-type\_specimen](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329061553/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/n1ke/3342527350/in/pool-type_specimen "http://www.flickr.com/photos/n1ke/3342527350/in/pool-type\_specimen")
